
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots)
target_compile_options(tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)
target_include_directories(tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/tx/schemeshard
)
target_link_libraries(tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  core-tx-schemeshard
  library-cpp-getopt
  cpp-regex-pcre
  library-cpp-svnversion
  core-testlib-default
  ydb-core-tx
  tx-schemeshard-ut_helpers
  udf-service-exception_policy
)
target_sources(tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/tx/schemeshard/ut_external_table_reboots/ut_external_table_reboots.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  60
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots
  TEST_TARGET
  tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots
  PROPERTY
  TIMEOUT
  600
)
target_allocator(tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots
  system_allocator
)
vcs_info(tx-schemeshard-ut_external_table_reboots)
